snippet.title: Night Warriors: Dark Stalkers Revenge Trailer 1996
snippet.description:
Night Warriors: Dark Stalkers Revenge Trailer 1996

Official Content From Capcom

Sequel to the popular arcade game, Darkstalkers. New features include five new fighters, a Survival Mode and a Group Battle Mode. The tournament is about to begin and the undead are ready.
Platforms: Sega Saturn

Sega Saturn
, Fighting,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Night Warriors: Dark Stalkers Revenge
